Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.algonquin.www.service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Service class responsible for user management and performance retrieval.

Provides methods for user login, registration, and fetching performance metrics.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserService()
    Constructs a new UserService instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()
      Constructs a new UserService instance.

      Initializes UserDAO and PerformanceMetricDAO implementations.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public UserDTO login(LoginRequest request)
      Attempts to authenticate a user using the provided login credentials.
      Parameters:
      request - the LoginRequest containing username and password
      Returns:
      the matching UserDTO if authentication succeeds; otherwise, null

    • register

      public void register(RegisterRequest request)
      Registers a new user with the system.
      Parameters:
      request - the RegisterRequest containing user registration details

    • performance

      public List<PerformanceMetricDTO> performance(String username)
      Retrieves performance metrics for users.

      If a username is provided, returns the performance metric for that specific user. If no username is provided, returns the performance metrics for all users.

      Parameters:
      username - the username to filter by; if null or empty, fetches all performance metrics
      Returns:
      a list of PerformanceMetricDTO objects matching the criteria
